name: Dreamers Escape
description:
Neko Neko was busy sketching in her notebook when she realised she accidentally made a mistake! Oh no! O_o

Discover her simple home, in which she resides in physically but seemingly wishes for something more. Will that mistake be something which can be fixed? What will Neko Neko learn? What will she find, and where will she end up?

---------------------------------------------------------------

Hello...! o/ First ever RPG Maker project, made in XP because... That's what I own. XD Uhm. It is a very short game, with all the art work and music made by myself. O^O This entire project began with the simplest of tools, a pencil and paper. Everything, absolutely everything in the game was first made with traditional art, and then recreated with pixel art, using another basic program. Something which everyone has I think. :P

Since I had a lot of free time, I decided to learn how to use the engine with the help of several YouTube tutorials, old forums online, and of course, with the guidance from one of my 'stars'. ^///^

I hope that if you choose to download this game, you enjoy it. Just be warned though, it is supposedly a "prologue"... A very short one, for the upcoming project I plan to create someday... Unfortunately, I cannot share too much information about that because I like secrets and surprises. X3
